parameters.name: All
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to remove all tags from the resource. This parameter takes effect when TagKey is not specified in the request. Valid values:

*   true
*   false (default)

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the tag. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~131035~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description:
The IDs of the resource.

> If you set ResourceType to stackgroup, you must set ResourceId to the name of the stack group.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource. Valid values:

*   stack: stack
*   stackgroup: stack group
*   template: template
*   templatescratch: scenario

parameters.name: TagKey
parameters.description: The tag keys of the resource. You can specify up to 20 tag keys.
